summary.experience: 3 years of experience in frontend development, specializing in React, TypeScript, Next.js, and the Redux ecosystem
summary.focus: Focused on optimizing processes, securing platforms, and increasing user engagement through strategic development and innovative solutions

current.title: Senior Frontend Developer
responsibilities: Optimized CI/CD pipeline with quality gates and linters, improving team efficiency
Reduced bundle size by 30% through code splitting and asset optimization
Improved application speed by identifying performance bottlenecks with analysis tools
Refactored Next.js B2B CMS codebase, enhancing project maintainability
Used Sentry for error tracking, Istanbul for coverage, improving reliability and test quality
Streamlined API development with Swagger code generators for faster iterations
Created comprehensive documentation, facilitating effective collaboration between teams
Implemented hybrid rendering, improving responsiveness and synchronizing client-server states with SSR and CSR
Integrated mock server CLI, enabling frontend-backend separation and accelerating parallel development workflows
Used Playwright for E2E testing, enhancing cross-browser compatibility and reducing QA time by 30%

previous1.title: Senior Frontend Developer

Integrated Stripe payment gateway for secure transactions and subscription management
Optimized API performance through caching and request optimization, reducing load and improving responsiveness
Implemented accessibility enhancements for a user-friendly interface in various markets
Implemented extensive unit tests using the Jest framework
Reorganized unstructured styling using Tailwind CSS, accelerating UI development and reducing CSS by 40%
Developed E2E tests with Cypress, ensuring robust application behavior
